title: Vikings star Alexander Ludwig shares new season 6 photos
text:
Is Bjorn mourning Lagertha? (Picture: @alexanderludwig/Instagram)

Vikings star Alexander Ludwig has dropped a string of brand new pictures from season six.

Treating his fans to a sneak peek of what’s to come in the final, the 27-year-old posted a series of snaps onto his Instagram.

And it seems he’s mourning the loss of his mother, Lagertha (Katheryn Winnick).

While the former queen does appear in one, several other photos show our Nordic favourites looking glum as they stare down at the ground – presumably at the shieldmaiden’s body.

Pictures of a Viking funeral have been leaked ahead of the series, with fans speculating whether or not it is Lags who finally meets her end.

However, other viewers were sure it was Bjorn’s funeral – although we’re not as convinced.

Vikings star Alexander Ludwig shares new season 6 photos (Picture: @alexanderludwig/Instagram)

Whose funeral is he at? (Picture: @alexanderludwig/Instagram)

In the caption, the actor wrote: ‘New stills from #vikings #season6 #december4 9/8c whose ready?’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Fans were quick to comment, and couldn’t help but share their excitement for the next installment of the History Channel hit.

‘I’m ready! But not ready for it to end,’ one replied, while another added: ‘Looking forward to watching it.’

Someone else wrote: ‘Oh yes we’re ready since last year! Bring it on.’

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

He’ll be battling Ivar The Boneless (Picture: @alexanderludwig/Instagram)

It seems as though Bjorn will do his dad Ragnar (Travis Fimmel) proud in the final season, as he takes on his younger brother Ivar The Boneless (Alex Høgh Andersen) for one last battle. Yet whether or not he will survive is another question.

The trailer states that the Cold War has started – but how many more battles can Bjorn survive before he enters the gates of Valhalla?

Ivar warns his big bro: ‘You have no idea what you are now facing,’ to which the warrior can be heard shouting: ‘We must resist.’

Staring out to sea, he adds: ‘Nothing will ever be the same again.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Has he lost hope, and will he start to give up? Or will Bjorn see the end of the battle and take home the crown – finally defeating Ivar?

Vikings season six will drop onto the History Channel and Amazon Prime on 4 December.

description: Is Bjorn mourning Lagertha? Vikings' Alexander Ludwig shares new season 6 photos.
